title: Add administrator privileges into this site

requirements.text: Create a user role management system in the backend that allows assigning and revoking administrator privileges to specific user principals

quotes: add administrator privileges into this site

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods to grant admin privileges to a user principal
Backend exposes methods to revoke admin privileges from a user principal
Backend exposes a method to list all administrators
Only existing administrators can manage other administrators' privileges

requirements.text: Create an admin user management page in the admin panel that displays all administrators and allows adding or removing admin privileges

quotes: add administrator privileges into this site

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel includes a 'User Management' or 'Administrators' page accessible from the admin navigation
Page displays a list of all current administrators with their principal IDs
Page includes a form to add new administrators by entering their principal ID
Each administrator entry has a remove button to revoke their privileges
Only authenticated administrators can access this page
Success and error messages display when granting or revoking privileges

requirements.text: Add a 'User Management' navigation link to the admin sidebar that routes to the administrator management page

quotes: add administrator privileges into this site

acceptanceCriteria: AdminNav component includes a 'User Management' or 'Administrators' link
Link routes to the new administrator management page
Link highlights as active when on the administrator management page

constraints: Maintain the existing single-actor backend architecture
Preserve existing admin authentication and authorization flow using Internet Identity
Do not modify read-only frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Creating different permission levels beyond admin/non-admin
Implementing user registration or self-service account creation
Adding email notifications for privilege changes
Creating audit logs for admin actions
